g.text: • Energy leaks through gaps in spiral
• Cu²⁺ toxic to microorganisms at >100 ppm
5. Reflections from soil to REV detector
✓ Field couples between center and spiral
✗ Missing directional coupler = can't measure S11
1. Assemble probe with stainless steel (not copper)
2. Attach ground plane at surface level
3. Connect directional coupler between Si5351 and probe
4. Seal all connections with silicone (not epoxy)
5. Push probe into soil until ground plane touches surface
